title: Mnuchin Indicates U.S. to Take Stakes in Airlines in Exchange for Grants...

content: WASHINGTONTreasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin indicated that the U.S. government would take stakes in airline carriers in exchange for billions in direct grants to the companies, part of a $2 trillion economic rescue package, according to people familiar with t… [+270 chars]
